channel.title: Comments for page "Psycho Hikers"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Psycho Hikers"

item.title: are you sure
item.content:encoded:
I regognise the picture, but the Hikers and the message "They bulldoze the village for a new hiking trail" is obviously a reference to The Hitchhikers guide to the galaxy. In that story the last living human goes Hitchhiking through the galaxy with an alien friend after his house is bulldozered away to make a new highway. Subsequently the earth (which was in fact a massive computer) is destroyed by aliens to make way for a new intergalactic highway.

EDIT:

I'm not so sure anymore about the pictures being a reference to LOTR

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
nope, it is a reference to LOTR.

Look at the pic closely and anyone who has seen the movies should know what I mean.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty sure that this is a reference to D&D characters.
